column53: can mix between the two methods, since it will add definitive questions (hint) to start the conversation with NPC. And adding option to add random questions for other purposes (speedup the game, go directly to something,...). Those two characteristics is like Last Epoch game item drop: randomness -> increase drop rate, definitiveness -> exchange with other users.
